comment: Obsolete version of ~ decmul1 as of 7-Dec-2022. The product of a numeral with a number (no carry). (Contributed by AV, 22-Jul-2021.) (Revised by AV, 6-Sep-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
